verses.verse: And the lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%>, even the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, going up <S%H5927><s%> from Jericho <S%H3405><s%> through the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> to Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>;
and it went out <S%H3318><s%> from Beth-el <S%H1008><s%> to Luz <S%H3870><s%>, and passed along <S%H5674><s%> unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Archites <S%H757><s%> to Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>;

and it went down <S%H3381><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Japhletites <S%H3311><s%>, unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%> the nether <S%H8481><s%>, even unto Gezer <S%H1507><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at the sea <S%H3220><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, took their inheritance <S%H5157><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> was thus <S%H1366><s%>: the border of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> was Ataroth-addar <S%H5853><s%>, unto Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%> the upper <S%H5945><s%>;

and the border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> at Michmethath <S%H4366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned about <S%H5437><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> unto Taanath-shiloh <S%H8387><s%>, and passed <S%H5674><s%> along it on the east <S%H4217><s%> of Janoah <S%H3239><s%>;

and it went down <S%H3381><s%> from Janoah <S%H3239><s%> to Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>, and to Naarah <S%H5292><s%>, and reached <S%H6293><s%> unto Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> at the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

From Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> went along westward <S%H3220><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Kanah <S%H7071><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at the sea <S%H3220><s%>. This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>;

together with the cities <S%H5892><s%> which were set apart <S%H3995><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, all the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

And they drove not out <S%H3423><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%>: but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, and are become servants <S%H5647><s%> to do taskwork <S%H4522><s%>.
